paper_abstract: By interleaving one length-N perfect sequence or ideal sequence according to elaborate phases, a new method of construction of zero correlation zone (ZCZ) and low correlation zone (LCZ) sequence sets is presented. The resultant sequence sets are optimal or almost optimal with respect to Tang, Fan, and Matsufuji bound. Furthermore, the new method provides flexible choice for the ZCZ and LCZ lengths.
paper_title: A new class of sequences with zero or low correlation zone based on interleaving technique
